product_name: Terry Butterfly Chromoly Gel Saddle - Women's
long_description: Built for women, the Butterfly Chromoly Gel Saddle features foam cushioning plus a thin layer of gel to absorb shock and take your comfort up a notch during long days in the saddle.
short_description: Built for women, the Butterfly Chromoly Gel Saddle features foam cushioning plus a thin layer of gel to absorb shock and take your comfort up a notch during long days in the saddle.
